email_text:
Subject: Your Amazon Order Confirmation - Order #1234567890

Dear [Customer Name],

Thank you for shopping with Amazon! We are pleased to confirm that your recent order has been successfully processed. Below you will find the details of your purchase:

Order Number: #1234567890
Order Date: [Date]
Delivery Address: [Shipping Address]

Items Ordered:
1. Product Name: [Product 1]
   Quantity: 1
   Price: $XX.XX

2. Product Name: [Product 2]
   Quantity: 1
   Price: $XX.XX

Subtotal: $XX.XX
Shipping & Handling: $X.XX
Total: $XX.XX

Payment Method: [Payment Method]

Your order is expected to be delivered by [Delivery Date]. Please note that you may track the status of your order by visiting the "Your Orders" section on our website.

If you have any questions or concerns regarding your order, please do not hesitate to contact our customer service team at [Customer Service Number] or reply to this email.

Thank you for choosing Amazon. We appreciate your business and hope you enjoy your purchase.

Warm regards,

Amazon Customer Service Team
